name: EarthQuake!!
body:
### Welcome
Eqarthquake!! shows the newest earthquake information ranging from N30 to N45, W112 to W130. The data is from USGS. 
### Features
1. Shows the newest 6 entries
2. Updates every 5 minutes(You have to leave the app open)
3. If there is any new earthquakes, you receive a double-vibration notification
4. Shows the distance between you and the earthquake
### Download
[Pebble App Store](https://apps.getpebble.com/applications/5530b9f67b5ea6a2380000e1)

Mobile Users: [Open in Pebble App](pebble://appstore/5530b9f67b5ea6a2380000e1) 

### Authors and Contributors
Author: Tyler Weimin Ouyang(@tylerwowen)

Contributors:
